post_title: T206 commons and minor stars (raw, but clean) available
post_content:
Good morning, 

I had this group of T206 Commons, and minor star is available for sale as a large lot but wasn’t able to move it so I am now breaking up the lot and selling individually

I know a lot of us participate here and several Vintage Facebook pages so you’ll probably see this post a couple of times but I wanted to let folks know they are cross posted so sales may occur here and there.

FYI, I’ve priced these using sold prices for grade 2 of each card as a reference point.  I realize these are not graded, but I have submitted many cards from this collection for grading recently, and the average grade received was too, so I thought that might be a logical anchor point for pricing.

Open to offers, of course. But like always, anyone who claims as sold will supersede any ongoing offers or negotiations. I think most of us know that drill pretty well.

Too many pictures to post individually so here’s a link of all 140 or so cards. Several have already sold this morning, please reach out or post here for any claims or questions.

Thx

Jeff

[url]https://photos.app.goo.gl/CibGi7CjLc1HmqAx8[/url]
